Title: QSO
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Hillary Benefiel, Lucas O'Connor (executive story editor), Tony Camerino (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: Root goes undercover at a radio station to protect the host of a conspiracy theory show who stumbles upon information that could get him killed. Also, Samaritan's agents try to convince a member of the team that their goals are noble.
